Bao g\u1ed3m 181 ph&ograve;ng ngh\u1ec9 v&agrave; bi\u1ec7t th\u1ef1. B&ecirc;n c\u1ea1nh \u0111&oacute; l&agrave; nh&agrave; h&agrave;ng chuy&ecirc;n ph\u1ee5c v\u1ee5 \u1ea9m th\u1ef1c theo phong c&aacute;ch &Acirc;u &ndash; &Aacute; v&agrave; nh\u1eefng m&oacute;n \u0103n mang \u0111\u1eadm n&eacute;t \u1ea9m th\u1ef1c v&ugrave;ng bi\u1ec3n. Ph&ograve;ng ti\u1ec7c, h\u1ed9i ngh\u1ecb hi\u1ec7n \u0111\u1ea1i v\u1edbi s\u1ee9c ch\u1ee9a t\u1eeb 40 &ndash; 200 kh&aacute;ch.
